page.title: 06Farming on Coll
page.content: Farmers on Coll keep various kinds of sheep and cows, Charlois, Jersey, Highland,Longlorn, sheep Suffolk, Swaledales,Blackface,Jacobs, Cross, Soays, Leicester and Hampshire down.Farmers on Coll grow mainly rape, wheat, potatoes, turnips, hay, silage, barley, and corn. A farmers year on Coll. Jan-feed animals Feb-dip sheep early lambs Mar-late calvss Apr-lambs start May-plough and plant potatoes Jun-spread fertilizer Jul-cutting hay Aug-cut silage Sep-harvest crops Oct-dig potatoes Nov-feed beasts with hay and cake Dec-get machinery ready for next season.
